img_summary: The image depicts a bowl containing several seeds, likely related to the "Celestial Pear Seeds" mentioned in the preceding text. These seeds are categorized as "Rare" items in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong* and are randomly obtained from collecting Celestial Pears. The image serves as a visual representation of one of the collectible seed items featured in the game's guide or walkthrough.
